name: Halloween is Cancelled
description:
Halloween has been cancelled!

But some neighbours have still left candy out. Can you collect all the candy while avoiding the clutches of the police before sunrise?

Made by Hannah McIntear, Tristan Peskett, Daniel Fraser, Nick Yee, and Jaylin Grierson. 

Created over a 48 hour time period to test how we work as a team! Made in October 2020.
